Items.name: Cure
Items.Description: You have found the cure! You'll have to find the right location to spread it to the zombies...

Items.name: Letter
Items.Description: A tattered note with 'HELP' written on the front
Items.use:
"Ope... we've made a terrible terrible mistake. The town that I love has been destroyed but, if you're reading this... perhaps it's not too late.
Our animal research at the hospital... no point beating around the bush... 
We made zombies. They're just so cool! I really should have thought this through.
I've synthesized a cure, it's in the hospital.
If you go there, tell Patient Zero I said 'HI!'"
It's signed Dr. Gear

Attached is a map of the town.
Road1   Hospital       Road2
Road3   TownCenter      Store
School   PoliceStation   Road4

Items.name: Apple
Items.description: Looks tasty, too bad the teacher prefers you!

Items.name: Sandwich
Items.Description: Looks delicious! Maybe eating this will restore some health points...
Items.use: It's a peanut butter, pickle, and mayo sandwich. It tastes better than it should.... How disturbing.

Items.name: Key
Items.Description: Hm...maybe I can use this for something...

Items.name: Baton
Items.Description: A tool that can come in use for protecting against Zombies.

Items.name: Stick
Items.Description: A tool that can come in use for protecting against Zombies.
